coffees.name: Nicaragua
coffees.description: Light Roast is a healthy and high-quality bean. It’s an organic and single origin coffee from the mountains of Nicaragua.

coffees.name: Columbia
coffees.description: To bring out the best flavors, you’ll want to try this coffee as drip, pour over, or cold brew.

coffees.name: Luminosa
coffees.description: It’s a blend from Columbia and Ethiopia that highlights the best qualities from each region.

coffees.name: Hawaiian Kona
coffees.description: This coffee is a blend of two of the best coffee beans in Hawaii. It’s a great way to start your morning.

coffees.name: Sumatra
coffees.description: The flavor has notes of brown sugar, wine, and dried fruit. The beans are grown in volcanic soil that’s mineral-rich.

coffees.name: Kenya
coffees.description: The coffee beans are also roasted in small batches, so you can be sure that you’re getting the freshest ones available.

coffees.name: Big Bang
coffees.description: The Big Bang Medium Roast variety is smooth and mellow, with tasting notes of tropical fruit.

coffees.name: Caribou
coffees.description: The Caribou Blend often has inconsistent quality. Sometimes the taste is on the bland side, and other times, it tastes bitter and burnt.

coffees.name: Excelsa
coffees.description: Colombian coffee beans from Caldas region. The flavor is smooth, full-bodied, and dark without being bitter.

coffees.name: Ethiopia
coffees.description: Best coffee beans from Africa region. So, if you’ve got health issues that steer you away from traditional coffees, a decaf dark roast is a good way to go.

coffees.name: Robusta
coffees.description: Made from Robusta plants with a hint of chocolate. A fine grind on these whole beans brings out their best, and it makes a great espumita when whipped with sugar.

coffees.name: Liberica
coffees.description: Beans with a smoky texture with hints of floral aroma. You’ll like the balance and smooth flavor of these coffee beans.

coffees.name: Indonesia
coffees.description: Arabica beans coming directly from Indonesia. This famous Indonesian coffee variety is smooth, full-bodied, and perfectly roasted.

coffees.name: India
coffees.description: Indian beans with a soft taste and high levels of acidity. If you’re looking for a stomach-friendly coffee, this is a good choice.
